thread.title: The Cold Frontier: A 'human zoo' at China's North Korea border

title: The Cold Frontier: A 'human zoo' at China's North Korea border
text:
The Cold Frontier: A 'human zoo' at China's North Korea border 11:47am BST - 02:04 
Reuters' Sue-lin Wong took a weeklong reporting trip along the border between China and North Korea with photographer Damir Sagolj. They found a revealing tourism trade on the Chinese side offering a glimpse into the country's communist past through North Korea. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Reuters' Sue-lin Wong took a weeklong reporting trip along the border between China and North Korea with photographer Damir Sagolj. They found a revealing tourism trade on the Chinese side offering a glimpse into the country's communist past through North Korea.
